start.speaker: guido
start.text: These teleports are starting to hurt my head...

start.speaker: sheep
start.text: Welcome to Zanaris human, how did you manage to get here?

start.speaker: guido
start.text: I got a dramen staff from the professor and was told to go here next.

start.speaker: sheep
start.text: Aaaah... I see. What is it that you are looking for?

start.speaker: guido
start.text: I thought you would be able to tell me that.

start.speaker: sheep
start.text: Whatever makes you think that? I am just a sheep.

start.speaker: guido
start.text: Well Sinterklaas hired some gnome to put me on a treasure trail instead of just giving me my present.

start.speaker: sheep
start.text: What is a Sinterklaas? Not some shepherd with a staff I hope?

start.speaker: sheep
start.text: Well it just so happens that there are some eclectic implings flying around here.

start.speaker: sheep
start.text: Rumor has it that they have a chance of dropping a clue scroll!

start.speaker: sheep
start.text: Well you look like you are an able hunter, who can catch these implings with his barehands!

start.speaker: guido
start.text: Is there really no other way...?

start.speaker: sheep
start.text: I'm afraid not, good hunting human!
